0.title: Query execution details

1.title: Number of unique users
1.description: The number of individual users who have interacted with any of the generative AI functionalities over the selected time frame.
1.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| summarize countDistinct(user_email)

2.title: Most active users
2.description: Top 10 most active users in the selected time frame.
2.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| summarize by:{user_email}, count = count()
| sort count desc
| limit 10

3.content:
# DQL query executions
This section shows how many AI-generated Grail queries have been executed. While the DQL may only have been generated once, we count each execution of that DQL separately.

4.content:
# Active users
This section shows how generative AI usage is distributed across your user base.

5.content:
# Interaction success rate
This section provides an overview of successful vs unsuccessful generative AI interactions. An interaction is considered unsuccessful if the generative AI generates invalid DQL, or if the user prompt triggers our guardrails or content filters.

6.title: Failed NL2DQL interaction details
6.description: Tip: Try out Open with... > Davis CoPilot on the "response" column to understand why the generated DQL is considered invalid
6.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_input, user_email, failure_reason, failure_message, response
| fieldsAdd prompt = concat("Please explain why the following DQL Query is invalid: \`\`\`", response, "\`\`\`") 
| fieldsAdd execute = true
| limit 50

9.title: Usage breakdown by skill
9.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| summarize {total_invocations = count(), successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), failed_invocations = countIf(status == "FAILED")}, by: {skill}
| fieldsAdd success_rate = (toDouble(successful_invocations)/toDouble(total_invocations)) * 100
| sort total_invocations desc

12.title: Query executions by app

13.title: Number of unique users over time
13.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| makeTimeseries unique_users = countDistinct(user_email), interval:24h

14.title: Query executions by app over time
14.query:
fetch dt.system.query_executions
| filter client.client_context == "ai-generated"
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{application=client.application_context}, interval:48h

15.content:
# Response error details
This section shows more information on cases where our generative AI was not able to assist users.

> üí° **Tip**: On the **Failed NL2DQL interaction details** tile, try out Open with... > Davis CoPilot on the `response` column to understand why the generated DQL is considered invalid.

16.title: Failed chat interaction details
16.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_input, user_email, topic, failure_reason, failure_message
| limit 50

17.title: Most frequently asked about topics in Davis CoPilot Chat
17.description: Davis CoPilot automatically generates a high-level topic for each prompt. This table provides and overview of the top 50 topics that are asked organically, from embedded app prompts, and via the Davis CoPilot workflow action.
17.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| summarize number_of_times_asked = count(), by:{topic}
| sort number_of_times_asked desc
| limit 50

18.title: DQL2NL issues
18.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "dql2nl"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_email, user_input, failure_reason, failure_message
| limit 50

20.title: Success rate over time
20.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| makeTimeseries {successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), total_invocations= count()}, by:{skill}, interval:48h
| fieldsAdd success_rate = (toDouble(successful_invocations[]) * 100 / total_invocations[])
| fieldsRemove successful_invocations, total_invocations

21.title: Execution duration over time
21.description: Average duration of how long it take to execute user prompts by skill, and how this develops over time.
21.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter status == "SUCCESSFUL"
| makeTimeseries execution_duration = avg(execution_duration_ms), by:{skill}, interval:48h

22.title: Recent question details: Davis CoPilot Chat
22.description: Recent organic questions being asked in the Davis CoPilot chat. This excludes prompts embedded in apps, and excludes workflow action prompts.
22.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter isNull(client.originating_application_context)
| filter client.application_context == "dynatrace.davis.copilot"
| sort timestamp desc
| fields user_input, user_email, status, response
| limit 50
| fieldsAdd success = if(status == "SUCCESSFUL", "‚òëÔ∏è", else: if(status == "FAILED", "‚ùå"))

23.title: Recent question details: Quick Analysis
23.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| sort timestamp desc
| fields user_input, user_email, status, response, client.application_context
| limit 50
| fieldsAdd success = if(status == "SUCCESSFUL", "‚òëÔ∏è", else: if(status == "FAILED", "‚ùå"))

24.content:
# User feedback
This section shows the distribution and details of in-product feedback that is provided through üëç/üëé by skill.

28.content:
# Generative AI Feature Adoption Dashboard

This dashboard is designed to provide administrators with a detailed overview of how Dynatrace generative AI features are being used across your environment. By providing key adoption metrics, user interaction details, feedback insights, and success indicators, you have the data you need to:
* monitor usage and feedback adoption,
* gain insights into what users need assistance with,
* understand when and where users are running into guardrails, and
* monitor for misuse or abuse of generative AI.



--- 
 
This dashboard primarily breaks down usage by skill. Dynatrace currently offers the following generative AI skills:

`chat` Refers to all interactions with the **chat interface** (includes user prompts, and app prompts)

`nl2dql` Refers to all **Quick Analysis** interactions which translates natural language commands into Dynatrace Query Language in Notebooks and Dashboards.

`dql2nl` Refers to all **Query Summary** interactions which provide a high-level summary as well as detailed breakdown of any DQL queries in Notebooks and Dashboards.


For more information on how Dynatrace maps skills to product features, please see our [documentation](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/copilot)

--- 
 

‚ÑπÔ∏è **Good to know**

* All user input and system responses have been masked for [PII patterns](https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/copilot-data-privacy#personal-identifiable-information-masking). This means that PII values in the user prompt and in the generated output have been replaced with dummy values.
* All interactions with Davis CoPilot are logged in Grail as `dt.system.events` and require the relevant permissions to retrieve and view such events.

29.title: Feedback details
29.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter event.type == "GenAI Feedback"
  | fieldsAdd feedback.text = if(trim(feedback.text) == "", null, else: feedback.text)
  | fields skill, feedback.category, feedback.type, feedback.text, user_input, response, user_email, timestamp
| sort timestamp desc

32.title: Total chat invocations
32.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| summarize {total_invocations = count(), successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), failed_invocations = countIf(status == "FAILED")}

37.title: Usage by skill
37.description: Number of successful and unsuccessful skill invocations (interactions with different functionalities).
37.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| summarize {total_invocations = count(), successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), failed_invocations = countIf(status == "FAILED")}, by: {skill}
| fieldsAdd success_rate = (toDouble(successful_invocations)/toDouble(total_invocations)) * 100
| sort total_invocations desc

38.title: Success rate by skill
38.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| summarize {total_invocations = count(), successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), failed_invocations = countIf(status == "FAILED")}, by: {skill}
| fieldsAdd success_rate = (toDouble(successful_invocations)/toDouble(total_invocations)) * 100
| sort total_invocations desc

39.title: NL2DQL issues
39.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_input, failure_reason, failure_message, response
| fieldsAdd prompt = concat("Please explain why the following DQL Query is invalid: \`\`\`", response, "\`\`\`") 
| fieldsAdd execute = true
| summarize count = count(), by:{failure_reason}

40.title: Chat issues
40.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_input, topic, failure_reason, failure_message
| summarize count = count(), by:{failure_reason}

42.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}
  //replace nulls with 0
  | fieldsAdd total_invocations = if(isNull(total_invocations), 0, else:toDouble(total_invocations))
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback = if(isNull(total_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(total_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback = if(isNull(positive_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(positive_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback = if(isNull(negative_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(negative_feedback))
  //calculate rate
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback_rate = (total_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback_rate = (positive_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback_rate = (negative_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback_rate, positive_feedback_rate, negative_feedback_rate
  | sort total_feedback_rate desc
  | filter skill == "chat"

43.query:

  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}
  //replace nulls with 0
  | fieldsAdd total_invocations = if(isNull(total_invocations), 0, else:toDouble(total_invocations))
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback = if(isNull(total_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(total_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback = if(isNull(positive_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(positive_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback = if(isNull(negative_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(negative_feedback))
  //calculate rate
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback_rate = (total_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback_rate = (positive_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback_rate = (negative_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback_rate, positive_feedback_rate, negative_feedback_rate
  | sort total_feedback_rate desc
  | filter skill == "nl2dql"

48.title: DQL2NL issues
48.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "dql2nl"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| fields user_input, failure_reason, failure_message
| summarize count = count(), by:{failure_reason}

49.title: Most recent question: Davis CoPilot Chat
49.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter isNull(client.originating_application_context)
| filter client.application_context == "dynatrace.davis.copilot"
| sort timestamp desc
| fields user_input, user_email
| limit 1

50.title: Most recent question: Quick Analysis
50.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| sort timestamp desc
| fields user_input, user_email, status
| limit 1

55.title: Recent question details: Davis CoPilot Workflow Action
55.description: Recent organic questions being asked in the Davis CoPilot chat. This excludes prompts embedded in apps, and excludes workflow action prompts.
55.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter client.application_context == "dynatrace.davis.copilot.workflow.actions"
| sort timestamp desc
| fields user_input, user_email, status, response
| limit 50
| fieldsAdd success = if(status == "SUCCESSFUL", "‚òëÔ∏è", else: if(status == "FAILED", "‚ùå"))

56.content:
# Performance
This section reports on the performance of our generative AI skills.

57.title: Topics triggering guardrails in Davis CoPilot Chat
57.description: Davis CoPilot automatically generates a high-level topic for each prompt. This table provides and overview of the top 50 topics that are asked organically, from embedded app prompts, and via the Davis CoPilot workflow action.
57.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| filter status == "FAILED"
| filter isNull(client.originating_application_context)
| summarize number_of_times_asked = count(), by:{topic}
| sort number_of_times_asked desc
| limit 50

58.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter status == "SUCCESSFUL"
| filter skill == "chat"
| summarize execution_duration = avg(execution_duration_ms)

59.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter status == "SUCCESSFUL"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| summarize execution_duration = avg(execution_duration_ms)

60.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter status == "SUCCESSFUL"
| filter skill == "dql2nl"
| summarize execution_duration = avg(execution_duration_ms)

62.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | filter skill == "chat"
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}

  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback, positive_feedback, negative_feedback
  | sort total_feedback desc

63.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | filter skill == "chat"
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}

  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback, positive_feedback, negative_feedback
  | sort total_feedback desc

65.title: NL2DQL Feedback Rate
65.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}
  //replace nulls with 0
  | fieldsAdd total_invocations = if(isNull(total_invocations), 0, else:toDouble(total_invocations))
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback = if(isNull(total_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(total_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback = if(isNull(positive_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(positive_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback = if(isNull(negative_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(negative_feedback))
  //calculate rate
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback_rate = (total_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback_rate = (positive_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback_rate = (negative_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback_rate, positive_feedback_rate, negative_feedback_rate
  | sort total_feedback_rate desc
  | filter skill == "nl2dql"

66.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"

  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}
  //replace nulls with 0
  | fieldsAdd total_invocations = if(isNull(total_invocations), 0, else:toDouble(total_invocations))
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback = if(isNull(total_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(total_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback = if(isNull(positive_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(positive_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback = if(isNull(negative_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(negative_feedback))
  //calculate rate
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback_rate = (total_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback_rate = (positive_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback_rate = (negative_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback_rate, positive_feedback_rate, negative_feedback_rate
  | sort total_feedback_rate desc
  | filter skill == "chat"

67.title: Invocations with feedback
67.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | filter skill == "chat"
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}

69.title: Feedback distribution
69.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}
| fields positive_feedback, negative_feedback
| fieldsAdd name = "sentiment"

70.title: Invocations with feedback
70.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | filter skill == "nl2dql"
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}

73.title: Invocations with feedback
73.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | filter skill == "dql2nl"
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}

74.title: DQL2NL Feedback Rate
74.query:
fetch dt.system.events
  | filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
  | filter in(event.type, {"GenAI Skill Invocation", "GenAI Feedback"})
  | summarize {total_invocations = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"), total_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback"), positive_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "positive"), negative_feedback = countIf(event.type == "GenAI Feedback" and feedback.type == "negative")}, by: {skill}
  //replace nulls with 0
  | fieldsAdd total_invocations = if(isNull(total_invocations), 0, else:toDouble(total_invocations))
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback = if(isNull(total_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(total_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback = if(isNull(positive_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(positive_feedback))
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback = if(isNull(negative_feedback), 0, else:toDouble(negative_feedback))
  //calculate rate
  | fieldsAdd total_feedback_rate = (total_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd positive_feedback_rate = (positive_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  | fieldsAdd negative_feedback_rate = (negative_feedback/total_invocations) * 100
  //clean up fields
  | fields skill, total_feedback_rate, positive_feedback_rate, negative_feedback_rate
  | sort total_feedback_rate desc
  | filter skill == "dql2nl"

75.title: Total NL2DQL invocations
75.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "nl2dql"
| summarize {total_invocations = count(), successful_invocations = countIf(status == "SUCCESSFUL"), failed_invocations = countIf(status == "FAILED")}

81.title: Embedded chat prompts
81.description:
Overview of usage of embedded conversation starters: https://docs.dynatrace.com/docs/shortlink/copilot-conv-starters. 

This is a sub-section of "DAVIS COPILOT" usage in the charts to the left of this one.
81.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| filter skill == "chat"
| summarize {total_invocations = count()}, by: {app = client.originating_application_context}
| fieldsAdd app = upper(replaceString(app, "dynatrace.", ""))
| fieldsAdd app = replaceString(app, ".", " ")
| sort total_invocations desc

86.title: Negative feedback breakdown

87.content:
# Feature adoption

This sections provides a breakdown of usage by skill, apps, and embedded prompts.

88.content:
# Prompt details

This section provides a detailed breakdown of the most recent interactions with the chat and NL2DQL skills.

89.title: Usage by app
89.description: Breakdown of all invocations by the primary app in which the skill is integrated. "Davis CoPilot" refers to the chat app.
89.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
//| summarize {total_invocations = count()}, by: {application = client.application_context}
| fieldsAdd app = if(isNull(client.application_context), "API", else: client.application_context)
| fieldsAdd app = upper(replaceString(app, "dynatrace.", ""))
| fieldsAdd app = replaceString(app, ".", " ")
| makeTimeseries count(), by:{app}, interval:24h
| sort `count()` desc

90.title: Usage by skill
90.description: Breakdown of all invocations by skill across all apps.

91.title: Usage by app
91.description: Breakdown of all invocations by the primary app in which the skill is integrated. "Davis CoPilot" refers to the chat app.
91.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| fieldsAdd app = if(isNull(client.application_context), "API", else: client.application_context)
| fieldsAdd app = upper(replaceString(app, "dynatrace.", ""))
| fieldsAdd app = replaceString(app, ".", " ")
| summarize count = count(), by:{app}
| sort count desc

92.title: Usage by skill
92.description: Breakdown of all invocations by skill across all apps.
92.query:
fetch dt.system.events
| filter event.kind == "GENAI_EVENT"
| filter event.type == "GenAI Skill Invocation"
| summarize {total_invocations = count()}, by: skill
//| makeTimeseries count(), by:skill, interval:24h
